channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 6:29 p.m. An alarm has been sounded in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 6:29 p.m. An alarm has been sounded in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages. #햆쮏쫧왐햨햟_쮏쐃햟혜혝혧 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
